name: Elemental Warfare [Prototype]
description:
Elemental Warfare is a Local Multiplayer game which will require 4 players and 4 game pads to play. 

Elemental Warfare is a MOBA inspired 4 Player split-screen game which is currently in it's prototype phase. The main goal in Elemental Warfare is a capturing the flag, whichever team captures the flag 3 times wins the game.

Credits:

  • Lead Programmer - Alper Sozuoz
  • Lead Artist - Josh Valdiny
  • Lead Environmental Artist - Harry May
  • Game Producer - Zak Butcher
